dmca.title: [EV1-C2055463P] RE: Infringement of Quiksilver Copyrights and Trademarks Including Qu
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 06, 2006 7:47 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C2055463P] RE: Infringement of Quiksilver Copyrights and Trademarks
Including Quiksilver, Roxy and DC Shoes

Pasting the attached file below:

ASSOCIATED WITH LAW OFFICES OF JOHN E. WAGNER INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY LAWYERS -
GLENDALE, CALIFORNIA DAVID R. SHAUB LESLIE G. WILLIAMS LISBETH BOSSHART KIM M.
TOMMASELLI YASMIN MANG SHAUB & WILLIAMS LLP ATTORNEYS AT LAW
12121 WILSHIRE BOULEVARD, SUITE 205
LOS ANGELES CALIFORNIA, 90025
TELEPHONE: (310) 826 - 6678
FACSIMILE: (310) 826 - 8042
E-MAIL : LAWFIRM@SW-LAW.COM
OF COUNSEL
EDWARD EVERETT VAILL
DONALD G. DAVIS
JOHN A. SHELLEY
ALICE A. SUN
December 5, 2006 VIA U.S. MAIL & E-MAIL
admins@theplanet.com
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 lcrosby@theplanet.com Dallas, TX 75207
Re: Infringement of Quiksilver Copyrights and Trademarks, Quiksilver, Roxy and DC
Shoes To Whom It May Concern, We represent Quicksilver, Inc. and its subsidiary
Circus Distribution, Inc, dba DC Shoe Co USA, a producer and worldwide distributor
of surf, skate and ski apparel, footwear and related casual lifestyle products
marketed under such well- known registered trademarks such as “Quicksilver
dmca.principal_name: John E. Wagner Intellectual Property (For Quicksilver, Inc.)
